confirmModal.title: Confirm update request

targets.query:
from(bucket: "jokley_bucket")
  |> range(start: -2d)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "venti")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "stockaufbau")
  |> last()
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({ r with Stockaufbau: if (uint(v: r._value) * uint(v: 3600000000000)) -(uint(v: now()) - uint(v: r._time))  >=0  and (uint(v: r._value) * uint(v: 3600000000000)) -(uint(v: now()) - uint(v: r._time))  <= 1844674388946713400 then (uint(v: r._value) * uint(v: 3600000000000)) -(uint(v: now()) - uint(v: r._time))  else uint(v: 0)}))
  |> yield(name: "last")

from(bucket: "jokley_bucket")
  |> range(start: -2d)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["device_name"] == "fan")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "device_frmpayload_data_RO1_status")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_value"] == "OFF")
  |> last()
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({ r with ON: if uint(v: now()) - uint(v: r._time) >= uint(v: 600000000000) then uint(v: now()) - uint(v: r._time) else uint(v: 0)}))
  |> yield(name: "last")

from(bucket: "jokley_bucket")
  |> range(start: -2d)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["device_name"] == "fan")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "device_frmpayload_data_RO1_status")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_value"] == "ON")
  |> last()
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({ r with OFF: if uint(v: now()) - uint(v: r._time) >= uint(v: 600000000000) then uint(v: now()) - uint(v: r._time) else uint(v: 0)}))
  |> yield(name: "last")

from(bucket: "jokley_bucket")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["device_name"] == "outdoor00")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "device_frmpayload_data_temperature" or r["_measurement"] == "device_frmpayload_data_humidity" or r["_measurement"] == "device_frmpayload_data_trockenmasse")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)
  |> yield(name: "mean")

from(bucket: "jokley_bucket")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["device_name"] == "fan")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "device_frmpayload_data_RO1_status")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: last, createEmpty: false)
  |> yield(name: "last")

from(bucket: "jokley_bucket")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["device_name"] != "outdoor00")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "device_frmpayload_data_temperature" or r["_measurement"] == "device_frmpayload_data_humidity" or r["_measurement"] == "device_frmpayload_data_trockenmasse")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)
  |> yield(name: "mean")

from(bucket: "jokley_bucket")
  |> range(start: -31d)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["device_name"] == "fan")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "device_frmpayload_data_RO1_status")
  |> elapsed(unit: 1s)
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({ r with elapsedFloat: float(v: r.elapsed)/3600.0 }))
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_value"] == "ON")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: 1d, fn: sum, column:"elapsedFloat")
  |> yield(name: "sum")

from(bucket: "jokley_bucket")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "device_frmpayload_data_battery")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)
  |> yield(name: "mean")

from(bucket: "jokley_bucket")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["device_name"] == "outdoor00" or r["device_name"] == "fan" or r["device_name"] == "probe01" or r["device_name"] == "probe02")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "rssi")
  |> group(columns: ["device_name", "_measurement", "_field"])
  |> aggregateWindow(every: 1h, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)
  |> yield(name: "last")

targets.query:
from(bucket: "jokley_bucket")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["device_name"] == "outdoor00")
  |> filter(fn: (r) =>  r["_measurement"] == "device_frmpayload_data_temperature" or r["_measurement"] == "device_frmpayload_data_humidity"  or r["_measurement"] == "device_frmpayload_data_trockenmasse" or r["_measurement"] == "device_frmpayload_data_sdef" )
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._value <= 100 and r._value >= -100)
  |> last()

from(bucket: "jokley_bucket")
                |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
                |> filter(fn: (r) => r["device_name"] == "probe01" or r["device_name"] == "probe02")
                |> filter(fn: (r) =>  r["_measurement"] == "device_frmpayload_data_temperature" or r["_measurement"] == "device_frmpayload_data_humidity"  or r["_measurement"] == "device_frmpayload_data_trockenmasse" or r["_measurement"] == "device_frmpayload_data_sdef" )
                |> filter(fn: (r) => r._value <= 100 and r._value >= -100)
                |> last()
                |> group(columns: ["_measurement"])
                |> min()

from(bucket: "jokley_bucket")
                |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
                |> filter(fn: (r) => r["device_name"] == "probe01" or r["device_name"] == "probe02")
                |> filter(fn: (r) =>  r["_measurement"] == "device_frmpayload_data_temperature" or r["_measurement"] == "device_frmpayload_data_humidity"  or r["_measurement"] == "device_frmpayload_data_trockenmasse" or r["_measurement"] == "device_frmpayload_data_sdef" )
                |> filter(fn: (r) => r._value <= 100 and r._value >= -100)
                |> last()
                |> group(columns: ["_measurement"])
                |> max()
